text-about-us: Satyal Publication has been in the educational publishing industry for more than 30 years. We started from a book shop 42 years ago in Biratnagar which transformed into the largest and one of the leading educational publishing house in the later days. Today, we are here as a new firm to change the way we educate our loved ones. This change, we are seeking to digitalize the education sector. 'Lets Change The Way We Educate Our Loved Ones!'
